item.title: Data visualization using ggplot2
item.description: This post will discuss how to visualize data using the ggplot2 package. R has several systems for creating visualizations, but ggplot2 is a package that is often used to present data. Before we begin, in this article I will use the mpg dataset in the ggplot2 package. This dataset contains a collection of observations from 38 car models. Of course, first of all, we need to load the ggplot2 package as follows:
